Umm .......... folks don't download it. This game has been encrypted to work with only firmwares 3.60 & above. Its confirmed that as of now it doesn't work on a 3.55 with or without an EBOOT patch.

http://ps3crunch.net/portal-2-ps3-game-encrypted-360-firmware-keys.html
Has more info on why this game wont work on anything but 3.60 for right now.
Cool, but we can certainly play it when the 3.60 keys'll be released =(
